description: Angular component for a note editor in a note-taking app, allowing editing and saving a single note.

classes.name: NoteEditorComponent
classes.description: Angular component providing a text editor for a note, with input binding and change detection.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook initializing the component, currently just referencing the NotesService.

methods.name: ngOnChanges
methods.description: Lifecycle hook reacting to input changes, detaching a copy of the note to avoid side effects before saving.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Method to save the current note via the NotesService.
